title: SilRiver Womens Silk Wide Straps Camisole V - Neck Cami Tank Top Stretch Undershirts Eyelash Laced Vest
features: 70% Silk, 30% Rayon, Camisole crafted from signature knitted silk fabric with a subtly textured matte surface, stretchy fabric that smooths the body without creating a sausage feeling
Deep V-Neck for both front and back with soft lace, great all-purpose layering cami, works well for layering, lounging or worn alone, versatility
Good fit, not too see through and the stretchy fabric keeps it from losing shape
Silk fabric feels good to the touch and on the body, as a day to day shirt, simply shirt a stylish look
Hand wash cold and line dry
description: Works great under dresses or as sleepwear, many ways, It can be layered under or over, worn as a nightgown, or as an LBD for a hot date, a must in your Wardrobe. Wear them every day, specially to wear under things that have a deep V - neck. Nature silk fabric is very comfortable,breathable, like another layer of your skin,recommend for sensitive skin. It is a natural fiber so you neither get hot nor cold.
